name: Assessing Chance in Neuro-Vascular Interactions
citation: Aksenov, Daniil (2025) Assessing Chance in Neuro-Vascular Interactions (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001689/draft
description: This Dandiset contains invasive neurophysiology and tissue oxygen recordings collected in awake, restrained rabbits during 10-minute resting-state sessions, supporting the analyses in “Assessing Chance in Neuro-Vascular Interactions.” The dataset is intended for studying neurovascular interactions/vasomotion and for reproducing the surrogate-based statistical framework used in the manuscript.
